location.name: Magic Tower
location.description: Hidden mystical tower where the twin masters Dokma and Uiseon live in seclusion
visual_elements: Dense, perpetual fog surrounding the area
Traditional East Asian architecture with weathered stone
Subtle signs of age and mysticism
location.atmosphere: Mysterious, isolated, otherworldly, hidden from the world

variation.name: exterior_day
variation.description: Tower exterior shrouded in daytime fog

generation.prompt:
Korean webtoon background illustration:
- Location: Magic Tower (마선루 (魔仙樓))
- Setting: Tower exterior shrouded in daytime fog
- View: exterior view

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
Ancient multi-story tower structure, Dense, perpetual fog surrounding the area, Traditional East Asian architecture with weathered stone, Isolated mountain setting, Mysterious aura, otherworldly atmosphere, Subtle signs of age and mysticism

ATMOSPHERE:
- Mood: Mysterious, isolated, otherworldly, hidden from the world
- Lighting: Diffused daylight through thick fog
- Color Temperature: 5500K (neutral)
- Shadow Intensity: Low (soft, diffused)

STYLE REQUIREMENTS:
- Art style: Korean webtoon (manhwa), wuxia genre
- Clean detailed linework, cel-shaded with gradient accents
- Color emphasis: #b8c5d6, #8a9eb5, #5a6f8a, #1a1a2e
- High detail environment art, publication ready
- No characters, environment only
- No text or UI elements

COMPOSITION:
- Wide establishing shot
- Depth and atmosphere emphasized
- Appropriate atmospheric effects

QUALITY: High detail, 2K resolution quality, professional illustration
